title: Can we apply for the CBSE improvement exam only as a private candidate? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Hey Priyanka Sharma What is the process for taking the CBSE improvement exam in 2019? Check out the answers on this question. It provides all the details of how you can apply as a private candidate.  Hope this helps! Good luck!

Yes there is no roll of your last school in this regard. But it will not affect about the value of marksheet. There is also mention the details of the school you had attended. It will be same as that of the regular students. www.asacademyindia.in
